txt_en: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
txt_cn: 每个不曾起舞的日子，都是对生命的辜负。

txt_en: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
txt_cn: 所有你乐于挥霍的时间都不算浪费。

txt_en: It's not whether you win or lose, it's how you play the game.
txt_cn: 重要的不是输赢，而是你如何比赛。

txt_en: You can cut all the flowers, but you cannot keep spring from coming.
txt_cn: 你能剪掉所有的鲜花，但你不能阻止春天的到来。

txt_en: It's good to dream, but it's also good to wake up again and see the world as it truly is.
txt_cn: 有梦想是好事，但也要懂得什么时候该醒来， 看清世界真实的样子。

txt_en: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
txt_cn: 胜利并非一切，求胜的执念才是。

txt_en: Forever is composed of nows.
txt_cn: 永恒由无数个此刻组成。

txt_en: I opened myself to the gentle indifference of the world.
txt_cn: 向这个冷漠而未温情尽失的世界敞开我的心扉。

txt_en: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying to do the best you can every day.
txt_cn: 你不必非要赢，但有责任每天全力以赴、持续精进。

txt_en: The best time to be happy is always now.
txt_cn: 幸福的最佳时机永远是现在。

txt_en: It is a thousand pities never to say what one feels.
txt_cn: 千般遗憾，莫过于从不说出内心所感。

txt_en: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
txt_cn: 越是在黑暗的时刻，我们越要凝神注视光明。

txt_en: I'm a diamond in the rough, a shiny piece of coal.
txt_cn: 我是未经雕琢的钻石，是藏着光亮的煤块。

txt_en: You're my favorite notification.
txt_cn: 你是我最期待的消息提醒。

txt_en: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
txt_cn: 如果我能阻止一颗心破碎，我此生便不虚度。

txt_en: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on.
txt_cn: 岁末非终，亦非始，而是续航。

txt_en: Of all sound of all bells, most solemn and touching is the peal which rings out the Old Year.
txt_cn: 在所有钟声中，最庄严、最动人的要数辞旧迎新的钟声。

txt_en: We walked beneath strings of red lanterns, as if threading through veins of hope.
txt_cn: 我们走在一串串红灯笼下，仿佛穿行于希望的脉络之中。

txt_en: Every mountain is unclimbable until someone climbs it.
txt_cn: 没有翻不过的山，只等敢攀的人。

txt_en: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
txt_cn: 我不畏惧风暴，因为我正在学习如何驾驶我的船。

txt_en: As long as I am breathing, in my eyes, I am just beginning.
txt_cn: 只要我还在呼吸，在我眼中，一切才刚刚开始。

txt_en: Fear cuts deeper than swords.
txt_cn: 恐惧比利剑更伤人。

txt_en: In nature, nothing exists alone.
txt_cn: 在自然中，万物从不孤立存在。

txt_en: It is no use doing what you like; you have got to like what you do.
txt_cn: 重要的不是做你喜欢的事，而是喜欢你正在做的事。

txt_en: By the power of truth, I, while living, have conquered the universe.
txt_cn: 借由真理的力量，我在有生之年，得以征服万物。

txt_en: The painted veil which those who live call life.
txt_cn: 那层彩绘的面纱，世人称之为生活。

txt_en: Always keep your promises.
txt_cn: 永远信守承诺。

txt_en: A true master is an eternal student.
txt_cn: 真正的大师永远都怀着一颗学徒的心。
